articles.title: NASA to Change How It Points Hubble Space Telescope - Science@NASA
articles.description: After completing a series of tests and carefully considering the options, NASA announced Tuesday work is underway to transition its Hubble Space Telescope to operate using only one gyroscope (gyro). While the telescope went into safe mode May 24, where it now…
articles.content: To return to consistent science operations, NASA is transitioning the spacecraft to a new operational mode it had long considered: Hubble will operate with only one gyro, while keeping another gyro a… [+812 chars]

articles.title: Stars descend on Dior's first Scottish fashion show since 1955 - BBC.com
articles.description: The French fashion house took inspiration from Scottish history for the show at Drummond Castle near Crieff.
articles.content:
French fashion house Dior has returned to Scotland for its first catwalk show in the country in almost seven decades.
